title: Last N Elements
description: In this lab, we will explore the lastN function which is used to extract the last n elements of an array. We will learn how to use the Array.prototype.slice() method to achieve this and see how it can be implemented in our JavaScript programs. By the end of this lab, you will have a better understanding of how to manipulate arrays in JavaScript and extract specific elements from them.

verify.name: Verify Node Commands Usage
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.
